Articles.Content:
well i was trying to dock some duna landers to my station, but when i tried to select the station to a target it selected this random piece of debris. i clicked on it many times and it kept happening, i don't know what to do this part is essential to my station and is dearly needed ASAP. Can any one help

PS. i think it mite have something to do with Mech-Jeb

No it's not MechJeb, this is just a bug with the game that has been happening for quite some time now... What I would recommend is the Haystack plugin which will let you select any vessel and target it from a menu in the map view. (Spaceport is down at the moment for maintenance, so here is a temp link just for you! Haystack Temp Link)
thanks a bunch. well time to go crash some kerbs into duna

thanks a bunch. well time to go crash some kerbs into duna

No problem, have fun!
